name: qsa-observer
description: handle elements lifecycle through CSS selectors

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:index && npm run rollup:esm && npm run fix:default && npm run size
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:index: rollup --config rollup/index.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.size: cat esm.js | gzip -9 | wc -c && cat esm.js | brotli | wc -c && cat es.js | gzip -9 | wc -c && cat es.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
